string.name: name
string.value: A Gift for the Dragon Master
When you reach Lvl. 30, #p9010000# starts talking to you...
#p9010000# says that you can now receive a gift from #p9010010# and that you should go to town and meet #b#p9010010##k. She will be very happy to see you...
You received a #t1022097# that #p9010010# made herself. Work harder and reach Lv. 50 before #bMay 5#k to receive a scroll that can be used on it.
Hello Evan! Congratulations on reaching Lv. 30! Do you remember what I told you before? #p9010010# has a gift for you!
Please go see #b#p9010010##k to receive the #bgift#k that she has personally prepared.
Congratulations once again for reaching Lv. 30! I look forward to seeing you becoming even more powerful!
Oh, you must not like the gift. I really thought you would like it...
Oh, you must be Evan! Nice to meet you! You really do look like a Dragon Master! Maybe I shouldn't refer to a Dragon Master as cute, but you're adorable!
You heard from the #p9010000# right? I, #p9010010#, have made this gift especially for you! I'm sure you're going to love it! Tada! A #t1022097#!

I made it because I thought it might be fitting for a Dragon Master. Actually I also prepared a #bscroll#k that can be used on the #t1022097#, but I can't give it to you yet. I will give it to you when you reach #bLv. 50#k so be sure to come back to me before #bMay 5#k.
Have you not gone to see #p9010010# yet? #p9010010# should be somewhere in town...
